Description: Ostracon, large section (comprising six fragments now joined) of the body of a red-brown pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey in section, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393511) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393511)
